the walkback depends on the workspace. I only experience the problem with my 
old workspace. it doesn't show up in a fresh workspace.
shutting down and restarting eclipse made the problem go away.

Could you attach your old workspace? I keep getting these kind of problems that 
I cannot reproduce because they are highly workspace-specific. Something is 
different in the way you use your workspace and it trips PDE models.

Fixed - was caused by stale model objects due to lack of Core resource 
notification.
